title: crashes non stop
body: me and my friend crash non stop even though our ms and our ping is fine and it gives us timers and is extremely frustrating to deal with.is there any way to fix this

replies.body: its just the usual report a bug bugsplat thing with it and attemting to reconnect although it might be our iternet provider

Crashing is a loose term so I'm hoping you may be able to give some more details about that.  What exactly is happening and when?  Do you receive any error messages and what does it say?  Let me know!
If you have windows 10 and recently updated it, try going back a version. That was seemingly my problem.
